hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="RS-test" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog3.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rediser.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rediser/tests/rediser.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog-server.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-server_netstat.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-server_avahi.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh lamp.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh lamp/tests/lamp.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh glog2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh glog/tests/glog2.sh'
